plugin.description:
Exact Connector Helper

The Exact Connector Helper is a special Shopware 5 plugin for the users of the xCore.
The Exact Connector Helper extends Shopware 5 API by adding a set of new calls that are needed by xCore. Below, the list of API endpoints made available by the Exact Connector Helper:

  • Shop currencies;
  • Order status;
  • Order status history;
  • Shipping methods;
  • Vat codes;
  • Product's extra attributes;
  • Product's extra attributes options;

In addition, the plugin add a new column to the product's attributes table xcore_date. This field allows the xCore to collect the last updated product's variants in order to synchronize the changed product's variant to Exact Online.
For more information check the plugin manual: Plugin Manual
